sense.def:
One's pursuit of something
je človekovo prizadevanje, da bi dosegel tisto, kar si želi.

seg.quote: How far should any of us go in pursuit of what we want?

sense.def:
The pursuit of an activity, interest, or plan
je vse tisto, kar naredimo, ko izvajamo neko dejavnost ali načrt.

seg.quote: ...some of the risks inherent in the pursuit of these policies.

sense.def:
The pursuit of someone or something
je lov na nekoga ali na nekaj.

seg.quote: ...a gamekeeper in pursuit of a poacher.

sense.def:
Kdor je
in hot pursuit of someone
, zelo odločno lovi nekoga.

seg.quote: He started running—with all the others in hot pursuit.

sense.def:
Pursuits
so stvari, ki jih delamo, zlasti kadar se z njimi ukvarjamo za razvedrilo.

seg.quote: Games like chess are rather intellectual pursuits.
